property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ Whenever your Dragons attack, you may put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When this creature would be destroyed, you may put 3 cards from your mana zone into your graveyard instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever your Hunters win a battle, your opponent chooses one of their shields and returns it to their hand. ■ While this creature is tapped, your opponent's attacking creatures must attack this creature if able. {DOUBLE BREAKER} {LINK RELEASE} (When this creature leaves the battle zone, choose one of its psychic cells and return it to your hyperspatial zone and flip the rest of the cards.)

card.name: Dimension Horn, of the Temporal Foundation

property.name: Race
property.value: Horned Beast

property.name: Rules
property.value: Instead of having this creature attack, you may tap it to use its {TAP} ability. {TAP} Destroy this creature. Then put up to 2 nature psychic creatures that have total cost the same as or less than the number of cards in your mana zone from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. (At the start of the game, psychic creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your hyperspatial zone, and if a psychic creature is put into a zone other than the battle zone, they are returned there.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-06 Duel Madness! Heroes Victory Pack: Mission Die Hardest

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) Instead of having this creature attack, you may tap it to use its {TAP} ability. {TAP} If there are 6 or more creatures in the battle zone, destroy all of them. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-06 Duel Madness! Heroes Victory Pack: Mission Die Hardest

property.name: Type
property.value: Psychic Creature

property.name: Race
property.value: Fire Bird/Hunter

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Psychic Link—At the start of your turn, if you have a Zero Kaiser in the battle zone, link it to this creature and flip this creature. ■ While this creature is tapped, your opponent's attacking creatures must attack this creature if able. (At the start of the game, psychic creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your hyperspatial zone, and if a psychic creature is put into a zone other than the battle zone, they are returned there.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-06 Duel Madness! Heroes Victory Pack: Mission Die Hardest

property.name: Type
property.value: Psychic Creature

property.name: Race
property.value: Beast Folk/Hunter

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Psychic Link—At the start of your turn, if you have Kiryuin Jin, Crimson Rage and Quattro Fang, Soul Gang Leader in the battle zone, link them to this creature and flip this creature to its higher cost side. {HUNTING} (While battling, this creature gets +1000 power for each of your Hunters in the battle zone.) (At the start of the game, psychic creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your hyperspatial zone, and if a psychic creature is put into a zone other than the battle zone, they are returned there.)

property.value: Beast Command/Hunter

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When this creature link awakens, you may put any number of Hunter creatures from your mana zone or hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. {TRIPLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Victory Rare

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-06 Duel Madness! Heroes Victory Pack: Mission Die Hardest

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Look at the top 6 cards of your deck. You may choose a creature from them, show that creature to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-06 Duel Madness! Heroes Victory Pack: Mission Die Hardest

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ Whenever your opponent would choose a creature by a spell effect, they can't choose this one. ■ Whenever a card is discarded from your hand by one of your opponent's spell effects or creature abilities, you may return up to 2 cards from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-06 Duel Madness! Heroes Victory Pack: Mission Die Hardest

property.name: Race
property.value: Human/Beast Folk

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ While you have another fire creature in the battle zone, this creature has "speed attacker". ■ While you have another nature creature in the battle zone, this creature gets +2000 power and has "double breaker". (A creature that has "double breaker" breaks 2 shields.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-06 Duel Madness! Heroes Victory Pack: Mission Die Hardest

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ If your opponent has more cards in their mana zone than you have in yours, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-06 Duel Madness! Heroes Victory Pack: Mission Die Hardest

property.name: Race
property.value: Melt Warrior/Hunter

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put a Fire or Nature psychic creature that costs 8 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. (At the start of the game, psychic creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your hyperspatial zone, and if a psychic creature is put into a zone other than the battle zone, they are returned there.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-06 Duel Madness! Heroes Victory Pack: Mission Die Hardest

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Destroy one of your opponent's psychic creatures that has power 11000 or less.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-06 Duel Madness! Heroes Victory Pack: Mission Die Hardest

property.name: Race
property.value: Beast Folk/Alien

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature, put a light, fire or nature psychic creature that costs 6 or less from your hyperspatial zone. (At the start of the game, psychic creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your hyperspatial zone, and if a psychic creature is put into a zone other than the battle zone, they are returned there.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-06 Duel Madness! Heroes Victory Pack: Mission Die Hardest

property.name: Race
property.value: Fire Bird

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. If it's a Dragon, put another card from the top of your deck into your mana zone.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-06 Duel Madness! Heroes Victory Pack: Mission Die Hardest

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. {METAMORPH} (If you have 7 or more cards in your mana zone, this spell gets the following Metamorph ability.) {METAMORPH}: Instead of the top card of your deck, put the top 3 cards of your deck into your mana zone.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-06 Duel Madness! Heroes Victory Pack: Mission Die Hardest

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-06 Duel Madness! Heroes Victory Pack: Mission Die Hardest

property.name: Race
property.value: Red Command Dragon/Hunter

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever one of your Hunters wins a battle by attacking, untap this creature and choose one of your opponent's shields. Put that shield into your opponent's hand. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Super Rare

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-06 Duel Madness! Heroes Victory Pack: Mission Die Hardest

property.name: Race
property.value: Snow Faerie/Hunter

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, look at the top 7 cards of your deck. From among them, you may put a non-evolution Dragon Hunter creature that costs 7 or less into the battle zone. Then shuffle your deck. That creature gets "speed attacker" until the end of the turn. At the end of the turn, destroy that creature. {HUNTING} (While battling, this creature gets +1000 power for each of your Hunters in the battle zone.)
